name: Monster Doll Prototype
description:
Prototype of a drag-and-drop monster part growing mechanic with a voodoo doll.

Controls Basics ActionInputWalkA/D or Left/Right
RunHold Space or Left Mouse Button
Open/close inventory
EscGrow creature part
Drag part onto dollQuitAlt+F4 Flight ActionInputFlap wings
Press Space or Left Mouse Button
Midair drift
A/D or Left/Right
